original_title: The Turn of the Screw - La Monnaie / De Munt
overview: Nothing is what it seems in an old English manor. When a new governess arrives, the children entrusted to her care seem to receive visits from the ghosts. What horrors occurred here before her arrival? Are the children innocent? Can we really trust what we see?  Based on a ghost story by Henry James, Benjamin Brittenâ€™s The Turn of the Screw is a psychological thriller in chamber opera format.
title: The Turn of the Screw - La Monnaie / De Munt
